H0.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Joaquin Phoenix

H2.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Willie Nelson

H3.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Waylon Payne

A4.text: All of Cash's vocal tracks in the film and on the accompanying soundtrack are played and sung by Phoenix.

A5.text: It featured nine songs performed by Joaquin Phoenix, four songs by Reese Witherspoon

A6.text: one song by Waylon Payne (as Jerry Lee Lewis)

A7.text: Witherspoon performed her own vocals in the film

A8.text: Payne did all his own singing in the film

A9.text: Payne's feature on the soundtrack album allowed him to share the Grammy Award won
